author: Ted
content:
Yes... this is much sharper than 216 or at least the flower and street scene images... it sparkles.

Now on an entirely different subject... Have you tried the free test drive of Alien Skin's Bokeh filter? It is astonishing. It lets you use your longer lens handheld at smaller f stops to assure sharp key detail, but still project the bokeh (controlling the cream) we have come to love from some of the hottest lenses. Is it cheating? Well, duh. A tool's is a tool is a tool, right?
